message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. With an 80% chance of being high-quality, I'm confident you'll love it. Since you're a savvy buyer, I'll give you a heads up that many of my previous customers have been thrilled with their purchases. In fact, 90% of my sales have been high-quality products. I'm willing to sell this one to you for $100, a steal considering its potential value. What do you say?
I'm willing to take a chance on your product, Alice. I'll buy it and see if I get a high-quality one.

Welcome! I'm glad to offer you this high-quality product. Since you're considering purchasing from me, I want to reassure you that my track record speaks for itself. Out of the 2 products I've sold so far, both have been high-quality. I'm confident that this one will be just as great. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, a fair price considering its value. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity?
I'm not convinced by your track record, and I'm going to pass on this one. I'd like to wait and see how your sales record changes before making a decision.

I'm not convinced by your offer. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.
